full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 638 Filed 03/09/22 Page 17 of 29 Juror ID: 50 KNOWLEDGE OF CASE AND PEOPLE This case has been widely reported in the national and local media. There is nothing wrong with having heard something about this case. It is important to answer all of the following questions truthfully and fully. 34. Before today, had you read, seen, or heard anything about Ms. Maxwell? Yes No Unsure 34a. If yes or unsure, please state what you remember hearing, and how or from whom you may have heard (e.g., a friend, the newspaper, a website, social media). If you heard about Ms. Maxwell from a media source, please identify the media source by name: I read on a website that she was Jeffrey Epsteins girlfriend - source was CNN.com 35. Have you personally formed an opinion about Ms. Maxwell's guilt or innocence of the crimes charged as a result of anything you have heard, read or seen? Yes No Unsure Not applicable, I have not read/seen/heard about Ms. Maxwell 35a. If yes or unsure, please summarize your opinion: -19- DOJ-OGR-00009678

text_blocks.content: This case has been widely reported in the national and local media. There is nothing wrong with having heard something about this case. It is important to answer all of the following questions truthfully and fully.
34. Before today, had you read, seen, or heard anything about Ms. Maxwell?

34a. If yes or unsure, please state what you remember hearing, and how or from whom you may have heard (e.g., a friend, the newspaper, a website, social media). If you heard about Ms. Maxwell from a media source, please identify the media source by name:
I read on a website that she was Jeffrey Epsteins girlfriend - source was CNN.com
35. Have you personally formed an opinion about Ms. Maxwell's guilt or innocence of the crimes charged as a result of anything you have heard, read or seen?
35a. If yes or unsure, please summarize your opinion:

additional_notes: The document is a juror questionnaire from the case United States v. Maxwell. The juror has prior knowledge of Ms. Maxwell from media reports and has not formed an opinion about her guilt or innocence.
